task.title: Manage Launch Configurations
task.shortdesc: This screen allows you to view a list of your launch configurations, create new launch configurations, create new scaling groups based on a launch configuration, and delete existing launch configurations.

step.cmd: You can toggle between the table view and the grid view by clicking the appropriate icon next to the View label at the top right of the screen.
Sort the launch configurations list with the Sort by drop-down list box.
Click the Create New Launch Configuration button. The Create new launch configuration wizard will appear.

task.title: Viewing Details of a Launch Configuration
task.shortdesc: Several items in the launch configurations list allow you to click on them to see more detailed information.

taskbody.context: To see more details about a launch configuration, or an object associated with an image:

step.cmd: Click the name iof the launch configuration to display detailed information about the selected launch configuration.
Click an image ID to see to see detailed information about the image associated with the selected launch configuration.
Click the name of a key pair to see to see detailed information about the key pair associated with the selected launch configuration.
Click the name of a security group to see to see detailed information about the security group associated with the selected launch configuration.

task.title: Context menu actions
task.shortdesc: Each entry in the launch configurations list has a context menu, accessible in the Actions column. Clicking the action icon brings up a menu of actions that you can perform on the selected snapshot.

taskbody.context: The following context menu actions are availabe:

step.cmd: This item will bring up the launch configuration detail page.
Selecting this item will cause the Create scaling group dialog box to appear with the launch configuration selection pre-populated with the selected launch configuration.
Select this item to delete the selected launch configuration.
